text.text_translated:
Lewis wants more marine protected areas. These are special places in the sea. Nature is safe there. Now, 3 out of 100 sea areas are protected. Lewis wants 10 out of 100 areas to be protected. Lewis wants to fix the damage people do. People catch too many fish. This is overfishing. They make the sea dirty. They throw rubbish in the sea. These things hurt the sea. More protected areas can help fix this damage.

Lewis went on many trips. He saw this damage to nature with his own eyes. He swam over coral reefs. The water got hotter. This made the reefs white. This is called bleaching. He saw places under the Red Sea. The water was not deep. They were like deserts. There was no life there. Plastic rubbish covered these places.

Pugh thinks nature can get better. It needs space. But we must hurry. We must look after our seas now. If not, we will soon have a problem. We will not be able to fix it.

best_attempt.text_translated:
Lewis wants more marine protected areas. These are special places in the sea where nature is safe. Now, 3 out of 100 sea areas are protected. Lewis wants 10 out of 100 areas to be protected. He wants to stop the damage people do. People catch too many fish. This is called overfishing. People also make the sea dirty. They throw waste in the sea.

Lewis went on many trips. He saw the damage to the natural world by himself. He swam over coral reefs. The water got hotter. This made the reefs white. This is called bleaching. He saw places under the Red Sea. They were like deserts. There was no life. There was a lot of plastic waste.

Pugh thinks the natural world can get better. It needs space to do this. But time is going fast. If we do not look after our seas now, we will soon have a problem. We cannot fix this problem.
